CommandDefinition.Name: listapplicationdetails
CommandDefinition.Description: List all objects, which are linked to an application.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: A version name. The application definition will be default. If there is no application definition, the highest version of the application is used.

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Enables verbose output and shows also objects that the application depends on

Argument.Name: excludeSubtypesOf
Argument.Description: Base types whose subtypes will be taken into a new version only when they are directly needed (by default subtypes of service-outputs will be included automatically into a new version). Use '*' for all subtypes.

Argument.Name: parentWorkspace
Argument.Description: The name of the parent workspace.

Argument.Name: fileName
Argument.Description: The name of the application file.
